name: three-js-multiplayer
description: Three.js multiplayer game with WebSocket server and Strapi CMS

scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server,strapi -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:strapi"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix game-client install && npm --prefix game-server install && npm --prefix game-data-server install
